Author: zerkalisz
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: Why Identity Is Vital in Blockchain Humanitarian Programs: Brad Whitman of Everest Privacy and anonymity are common topics in cryptocurrency — but not everyone wants that. In the world of NGOs and humanitarian assistance programs, knowing exactly who you’re transacting with is vital from both a trust and regulatory standpoint. That’s where platforms like Everest come in. Bitsonline‘s George Levy spoke to Brad Whitman at Money 20/20 2018 in Las Vegas to find out how and why. https://bitsonline.com/identity-blockchain-brad-whitman-everest/

Author: BITpashaCOIN
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: This is great, if the bounty program does not extended, then, in my experience, the project is doing great!  Quote from: zerkalisz on November 08, 2018, 04:53:53 PM Why Identity Is Vital in Blockchain Humanitarian Programs: Brad Whitman of Everest Privacy and anonymity are common topics in cryptocurrency — but not everyone wants that. In the world of NGOs and humanitarian assistance programs, knowing exactly who you’re transacting with is vital from both a trust and regulatory standpoint. That’s where platforms like Everest come in. Bitsonline‘s George Levy spoke to Brad Whitman at Money 20/20 2018 in Las Vegas to find out how and why. https://bitsonline.com/identity-blockchain-brad-whitman-everest/  Well, your point of view is fundamentally wrong and contradicts the ideas and principles of the word Blockchain.

Author: TheCoinosopher
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: Your response is fundamentally incorrect due to an assumption you have made regarding the ideas and principles of the word blockchain. I suggest you read up on what the blockchain is, and understand that anonymity is not necessary and that cryptography is used for functionality and security. The blockchain provides a trustless transaction engine, but large organizations still need to know who they are transacting with. Blockchain cuts out the middlemen where the majority of fraud and leakage occur when dealing with emerging markets.  Here is a good place to start: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blockchain

Author: joseph_id
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: Thank you for your interest in our project. There are computer experts across Africa, and in Kenya and Nigeria especially there are vibrant communities of developers today. The agreement we have announced with 1000 Alternatives is to help their technology accelerators already in place in those three countries to learn about blockchain technologies and build on top of the Everest platform and protocol.

Author: MrSlave
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: How does Everest govern the data of users to prevent misuse by their 3rd party clients?Can you please explain that part abit more?

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: The data on the supernodes are secured with the user’s public/private keypair, biom- etry, as well as a password/PIN. There is no ability to DDOS the Everest infrastruc- ture as it is decentralized, has a financial disincentive in fees charged for transactions,  and API requests are funneled through a queueing regulator. This ensures equal ac- cess to the services and mitigates potentially negatively-impacting usage or load.

Author: Fiery_Mouwnies
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: These are the following lock-ups / vesting periods for EverID tokens:  ·      2 years for tokens reserved for the Company (25% immediately after 6 month lock-up; remaining 75% vests monthly in equal amounts over the next 18 months) ·      1 year for Seed round participants (25% immediately; remaining 75% vests 25% quarterly over the next 9 months following 3 month lock-up) . ·      3-month lock-up for Pre-Sale participants (100% immediately following lock-up)

Author: Londondungeon
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: DEFINITION of 'Proof of Stake (PoS)' Proof of Stake (PoS) concept states that a person can mine or validate block transactions according to how many coins he or she holds. This means that the more Bitcoin or altcoin owned by a miner, the more mining power he or she has.  Basically you use some of your coins/tokens and stake them and get more as a reward.

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: The CEO and co-founder of Everest was an advisor to Kai Labs, a blockchain-focused think tank & accelerator that brought together entrepreneurs, corporations, domain experts and investment capital to advance the development of distributed systems & applications for a wide range of vertical markets. Previously, Bob was the General Manager of Licensing at BitTorrent, and VP of Strategy & Business Development at Neulion and DivX. Having gone through two IPOs, two acquisitions and raised millions of dollars in financing, including founding a startup based on two of his own patents, Bob has a keen understanding of the digital landscape. Over the past 20 years, Bob increased revenue for software, video, mobile, consumer electronics, digital media, consumer Internet and semi/IC technology companies.  More info about the team can be found on page #30 in WP or at this link: https://everest.org/#team. You may also refer to the team LinkedIn profiles for more details.

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: The storage array of the user’s identity information is known as an Everest Datagram. It consists of a nested series of information locked behind biometric locks and knowledge locks (password, PIN) designed to bootstrap the unlocking of the next section of the datagram. Each individual has an Everest Datagram stored in IPFS on the supernodes, referenced by the smart contract which recorded their identity to the Everest ID Blockchain.

Author: Fekete
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: What would be the benefits of Everest for a regular Joe?

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: Cash Transfer: 100% validation of money sent to biometrically verified users. Remittance: easy, cost-effective way for banks to offer money transfer services. Micro-finance: full solution to lend money to the billions of people and SMEs. Micro-insurance: collect documents, biometrically sign contracts to serve billions of users with or without devices. Medical records: manage documents hosted in the cloud or device, track healthcare for all. Land: combine titles, GPS coordinates, and identities to bank and secure land. ID verification: verify identities for value exchange with integrated KYC/AML.

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: Everest is the world’s only device-free globally accessible, digital transaction protocol with built-in identity. Through the use of digital identities, electronic wallets, document management, and biometrics, users will be able to digitally verify their identity for public services and claim their social and economic rights  The deviceless nature of the platform will empower half of the world's population with new economic opportunities.  Device-free identity verification  Peer-to-peer registration using biometric data allows anyone, anywhere to enroll in the platform, without the need for a device.  Seamless value transfer  Everest reduces leakage, fraud, friction, and data access costs with a transparent transaction record and verifiable identity.   Total financial inclusion  Creating global access to existing financial services unlocks the $20 trillion economy of emerging markets.   Individual empowerment  Everest enables users to be in total control of their data and provides access to formal economic systems.  Institutional efficiency  Reduced transfer and data storage fees will allow institutional growth in emerging nations.  Economic growth  The deviceless nature of the platform will empower half of the world's population with new economic opportunities.

Micro-insurance: collect documents, biometrically sign contracts to serve billions of users with or without devices. Medical records: manage documents hosted in the cloud or device, track healthcare for all. Land: combine titles, GPS coordinates, and identities to bank and secure land. ID verification: verify identities for value exchange with integrated KYC/AML.

Body: Yes, Through the API, users are able to interact with their EverID and EverWallet on devices that they don’t own, like, fingerprint-sensor enabled ATMs, or facial-recognition enabled medical tablets. They are also able to use their EverID or EverWallet in apps not provided by Everest for services like biometric unlocking, simple user onboarding (automated KYC/ AML checks), and medical form auto-fill. I hope this helps!   Best Regards,  MaZeeCM

Author: asishe
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: EverID is developing a unique platform that will create a digital identification standard powered by blockchain that does not need personal devices to function. An ecosystem consisting of digital wallets, IDs and document management solutions will be created to empower people to access commodities, such as banking products, with ease, and security.  EverID will use biometric data to allow anyone to join a platform without having to use any special devices, allowing everyone to benefit from digital identification!

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: Everest utilizes biometric identity and an immutable ledger that allows the seamless exchange of value between governments, banks, NGOs, insurance companies, hospitals, and other organizations. It reduces fraud and leakage. It makes identity verification at scale more cost-effective than ever before.   Users receive social and economic benefits from their digital identity. No device is needed to access these benefits. An inclusive and secure identity means seamless value transfer and access to global economic services such as banking, credit, and insurance.  Cash Transfer: 100% validation of money sent to biometrically verified users. Remittance: easy, cost-effective way for banks to offer money transfer services. Micro-finance: full solution to lend money to the billions of people and SMEs. Micro-insurance: collect documents, biometrically sign contracts to serve billions of users with or without devices. Medical records: manage documents hosted in the cloud or device, track healthcare for all. Land: combine titles, GPS coordinates, and identities to bank and secure land. ID verification: verify identities for value exchange with integrated KYC/AML

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: Yes, there are the following lock-ups / vesting periods for Everest tokens: ·      2 years for tokens reserved for the Company (25% immediately after 6 month lock-up; remaining 75% vests monthly in equal amounts over the next 18 months) ·      1 year for Seed round participants (25% immediately; remaining 75% vests 25% quarterly over the next 9 months following 3 month lock-up) . ·      3-month lock-up for Pre-Sale participants (100% immediately following lock-up)

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: Cash Transfer: 100% validation of money sent to biometrically verified users. Remittance: easy, cost-effective way for banks to offer money transfer services. Micro-finance: full solution to lend money to the billions of people and SMEs. Micro-insurance: collect documents, biometrically sign contracts to serve billions of users with or without devices. Medical records: manage documents hosted in the cloud or device, track healthcare for all. Land: combine titles, GPS coordinates, and identities to bank and secure land. ID verification: verify identities for value exchange with integrated KYC/AML."

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: It utilizes biometric identity and an immutable ledger that allows the seamless exchange of value between governments, banks, NGOs, insurance companies, hospitals, and other organizations. It reduces fraud and leakage. It makes identity verification at scale more cost-effective than ever before.   Users receive social and economic benefits from their digital identity. No device is needed to access these benefits. An inclusive and secure identity means seamless value transfer and access to global economic services such as banking, credit, and insurance.

Author: SamEmpori
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: Everest is more than just user ID verification, and wants the name to reflect this. There seems to be a general understanding and positive feedback from the community about the approach.  Quote from: Dzefa on August 27, 2018, 04:40:55 PM What is the amount of tokens prepared for the bounty pool? There are 7,000,000 IDs reserved for the Bounty campaign  Quote from: Slava_Osipov on August 27, 2018, 04:55:52 PM Hey. Tell us please what structure of bonuses do you have for investors and is there anyway? The seed round had a 50% discount (2M raised), then in a tiered structure there will be a 30%, 20% and 15% discount for the pre sale which is open for participants. The tier structure discount depends on the time of investment and how much has been raised so far. 20M is the goal to be met during these sale rounds.  You can sign up for the pre sale at the bottom of the website https://everest.org

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: While our name has changed, our goals, mission, and vision remain constant. We needed a brand that fully encompassed the monumental potential/scope of our platform. The EverID brand will continue to exist under the Everest umbrella representing the identity platform component of our solution.

Body: Everest will initially issue a total of 800,000,000 Tokens. 37.5% of IDs will be allocated for Everest co-founding members, board members, advisory board members, and team. 24.5% of IDs will be held in a reserve, allocated for future employees, other value exchange and future sales. 38.0% of IDs will be allocated to these rounds of financing raising roughly USD $20M (including 7,000,000 IDs for the Bounty campaign).

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: Hi, we've already answered this in the past messages and announcement on our Telegram channel. Here's the announcement:  "Some of you may have already noticed, but we have officially rebranded from EverID to Everest. We would like to thank you all for your patience during this ongoing transition. While our name has changed, our goals, mission, and vision remain constant. We needed a brand that fully encompassed the monumental potential/scope of our platform. The EverID brand will continue to exist under the Everest umbrella representing the identity platform component of our solution. "   Best Regards,  MaZeeCM

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: It was supposed to be EverID and now we are using Everest. The reason is written above this message.   Best Regards,  MaZeeCM

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: We will release the presale data, just not at this exact point.

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: We use smart contracts that allow users to control what data, and for how long they provide information to 3rd parties. That information will only be available to said 3rd parties through their Everest API for the amount of time specified in the smartcontract and will no longer be available through the API after the specified time period has expired.

Author: Fiery_Mouwnies
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: We wanted a brand that fully encompasses our business model, and doesn't create tunnel vision towards on aspect of our platform.  While Identity is a huge aspect of our platform as it plays an integral part in all other functionality, the actual APIs and DApps are a much bigger deal. Hence, the rebrand to Everest.

Author: Fiery_Mouwnies
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: Everest is an economic and value transfer platform, anchored in biometric identity, which is the world?s only device-free, globally accessible, self-sovereign digital wallet and payment solution.  By leveraging blockchain and distributed storage technologies, Everest empowers banks, governments, NGOs, hospitals, businesses and other institutions to transparently and effectively exchange value with those hard to reach users, especially the 5 billion users without smartphones, all while giving users the most control and privacy in the market.  App developers leverage Everest?s platform for services like remittances, micro-finance, micro-insurance, payroll, cash transfer, KYC/AML, land, medical records, etc.   I recommend you check out our website: https://everest.org and read our whitepaper for more info: https://everest.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/Everest_whitepaper.pdf

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: Absolutely, as bio-metric advances are made, Everest will incorporate additional sources of bio-metrics, including iris, pulse, voice, and DNA. Each bio-metric lock is accompanied by a user knowledge proof to ensure user consent to the transaction.   Best Regards,  MaZeeCM

Body: " Identity Network - Everest will fund the non-profit Identity Network foundation that will oversee elements of the shared systems in the Everest Supernodes. If $10M USD is raised from the initial token sale then 5% will be allocated to establish the Identity Network foundation and for every USD$ 1.00 above $10M, 2% will be allocated to the Identity Network foundation. The governance of the Identity Network foundation will be to safeguard the independence, and transparency of the network so that it exists for humanity forever."  so this Identity Network will actually hold all Identity data?

Author: SamEmpori
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: The Co-Founder and CEO Bob Reed has deep knowledge of working in the field of information technology. In particular his work with Peer-to-Peer applications (working at BitTorrent) as well as his work in Blockchain Consultancy (Partner Kai Labs) makes him a good fit for the CEO position of Everest.  His partner, Co-Founder and CPO Brad Witteman, has also worked with BitTorrent and Emergent (with expertise in the field of DAO and application building). He has had several senior positions and is knowledgable with DApps. With his knowledge of service products that are relevant to the Blockchain industry (P2P, DAO) he is a good fit for the position of Chief Product Officer.  Mike Kall, the CTO, prior to Everest worked with Yahoo!'s infrastructure and at Netflix. He specializes in Network, Security and Cloud Architecture. His knowledge of network and security are an important attribution to companies operating in the Blockchain industry.  The team has a wide range of very applicable knowledge that can create a significant contribution to the Blockchain tech industry. You can read more about them on their website:  https://everest.org#team You can also find other sources there, such as their LinkedIn.

Author: SamEmpori
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: The next major milestone from an implementation perspective is in October when the Everest 1.0 platform is planned to go live (token, ID + Wallet DApp, blockchain implementation, admin console and API)  Other major milestones can be found here: https://everest.org/#roadmap  Quote from: Sarma on August 15, 2018, 08:49:48 PM Regarding the rebranding, anything else important changed, or only the name?  No. The rebranding was done to get Everest's vision clear to their audience. The Everest's brand fully encompasses the business model, rather than focus on one of our aspects. Wile Identification is a huge aspect of the platform, the actual APIs and DApps are far beyond basic identification. Have a look in the whitepaper if you have the time, in particular, page 11 from the whitepaper (blockchain technology).  Quote from: frazeer on August 15, 2018, 08:55:55 PM Quote from: MaZeeCM on August 15, 2018, 12:18:35 PM Quote from: descuri on August 15, 2018, 10:20:16 AM Quote from: Lognak on August 15, 2018, 09:50:10 AM Quote from: Fiery_Mouwnies on August 15, 2018, 08:08:23 AM Quote from: DammeClaudeVanJean on August 15, 2018, 07:02:08 AM What are some problems that you are trying to solve with EverID?  By leveraging blockchain and distributed storage technologies, Everest empowers banks, governments, NGOs, hospitals, businesses and other institutions to transparently and effectively exchange value with those hard to reach users, especially the 5 billion users without smartphones, all while giving users the most control and privacy in the market.  It does sound quite interesting - all these things you are trying to achieve, but how will you approach people who do not use updated technology?  you mean people who do not use smartphones? maybe a desktop app would be ok for them.  Collect documents, biometrically sign contracts to serve billions of users with or without device.  But if they do not have the device how can you enable the collection? For collection of data the individual does not have to own a device himself. An agent of the organisation will in this scenario connect the person with the agent DApp. The individual just needs to be physically present.

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: EverID is a device-free, universal identity and value-exchange platform that allows anyone to prove their identity, store value, and transfer funds. Users receive social and economic benefits from their digital identity. No device is needed to access these benefits. An inclusive and secure identity means seamless value transfer and access to global economic services such as banking, credit, and insurance.  Best regards

Author: asishe
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: Identity verification is an obstacle to growth in emerging markets as it prevents people from accessing formal economic services, such as banking, insurance, and lending. Ultimately, this significantly limits the number of people who can access the economy, and thereby stalls economic development at the institutional level.And EverId is Addressing This issue and has a Device Free Authentication Which i believe helps in Diminishing the limits .

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: Can you come again with your question more clearly? I'd recommend you to read our onpager and whitepaper first. Here are some use cases to refer:  - Cash Transfer: 100% validation of money sent to biometrically verified users. - Remittance: easy, cost-effective way for banks to offer money transfer services. - Micro-finance: full solution to lend money to the billions of people and SMEs. - Micro-insurance: collect documents, biometrically sign contracts to serve billions of users with or without devices. - Medical records: manage documents hosted in the cloud or device, track healthcare for all. - Land: combine titles, GPS coordinates, and identities to bank and secure land. - ID verification: Verify users through biometrics, government IDs and third party attestations.

ID verification: verify identities for value exchange with integrated KYC/AML."

Author: SamEmpori
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: I suggest reading back to post: Quote from: MaZeeCM on August 05, 2018, 08:08:54 PM EverID is a device-free, universal identity and value-exchange platform that allows anyone to prove their identity, store value, and transfer funds. Users receive social and economic benefits from their digital identity. No device is needed to access these benefits. An inclusive and secure identity means seamless value transfer and access to global economic services such as banking, credit, and insurance. As always, have a look into the EverID whitepaper: https://everid.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/ever_id_whitepaper-1.pdf -  Quote from: WhoWuWho on August 05, 2018, 11:14:41 PM Who is target market of EverID? The customer for EverID ranges a large set of clientele that operates with user data. You can think of money transfer companies, semi-governmental organizations that work with user information, but also humanities organizations like the United Nations. -  Quote from: Inmytree on August 05, 2018, 11:48:17 PM Who can guarantee that EVERID is able to protect your privacy? It always comes down to an individual to be informed and take precautions and good judgment when handling private info. Governance is a major role for companies like EverID. They have to be compliant with GDPR and other data privacy laws. The aim of EverID is to assure users are always capable of selecting who has access to their data and for how long. Furthermore, they allow data to also be deleted or made unavailable.

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: 38.0% of IDs will be allocated to these rounds of financing raising roughly USD $20M (including 7,000,000 IDs for the Bounty campaign). - EverID is raising up to $2m in Seed funding to support its first months of operation (including reaching its pre-sale, beta version of the EverID stack, and growing strategic partnerships) by selling IDs at a discount of up to 50% the targeted pre-sale price. Part of the Seed fund will be used in the project for product development, intellectual property protection, product integration and customization for trials, personnel, travel, and general business expenses. - The pre-sale rounds are intended to be used to raise proceeds for EverID to set up its infrastructure, build its network, contract with vendors, service providers and strategic partners, and issue its tokens in the pre-sale. The anticipated use of funds is as follows: customer acquisition, infrastructure costs, engineering and integrations, regional rollouts, sales and marketing, as well as legal licensing and operations.The proceeds will be used to expand the network and network applications.

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: It utilizes biometric identity and an immutable ledger that allows the seamless exchange of value between governments, banks, NGOs, insurance companies, hospitals, and other organizations. It reduces fraud and leakage. It makes identity verification at scale more cost-effective than ever before.

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: EverID is a device-free, universal identity and value-exchange platform that allows anyone to prove their identity, store value, and transfer funds. Users receive social and economic benefits from their digital identity. No device is needed to access these benefits. An inclusive and secure identity means seamless value transfer and access to global economic services such as banking, credit, and insurance.

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: The inability to prove identity is the single most significant barrier to economic inclusion. Banks, governments, NGOs, hospitals, businesses & users require ID verification, a wallet, and transaction system to exchange value. And here is how EverID removes the barriers: EverID is the world’s only device-free, globally accessible, digital identity platform. Through the use of digital identities, digital wallets, document management, and biometrics, users will be able to digitally verify their identity for public services and claim their social and economic rights. You may refer to the EverID's WP to know more details on Ever ID use cases: https://everid.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/ever_id_whitepaper-1.pdf

Author: MaZeeCM
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: Thats a good question. The network will be based on 'IDs', wich are a utility token that allow access to the EverID network and the applications and services built upon it. The 800 million issued ID tokens will be purchased by banks, governments, NGOs, large organizations, and users (i.e. remittance senders) that want to access EverID’s network. Institutions are given varying levels of access to the platform based on how many tokens they hold while users will not be required to hold IDs in order to receive value.

Author: PoweredBy SMF
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: No matter where you go, you need a means to prove your identity on your own, and you need to work even if a war breaks up or becomes a refugee. EverID solves that, EverID is working on user-centric, biometric, global identity solutions on the blockchain.

Author: crypto_koins
Title: [ANN][ID] EVEREST - Elevating Humanity
Body: EverID has built a decentralized digital identity system to store and confirm user identity data, documentation, and biometrics. The platform is available to all human beings from birth until death. It does not require a mobile device to join, is encrypted to protect users’ privacy, and is interoperable with other systems.Institutions, corporations, and government organizations can effectively, cheaply and quickly validate user identity, at scale. Value can then be transferred securely to the correct recipient with reduced transaction costs, lower losses from leakage, and innovations in service and value transfer.  To know more please check out the website,WP and welcome to the EverID telegram group. Thanks
